description:
From the first run to the last, this cozy jacket will help your little one forget about the weather. With its seam sealed waterproof breathable shell, the Freedom Extreme jacket offers all day protection from the elements. Lined with multiple densities of efficient insulation, warmth is focused where it is needed most. When the heavens open or the wind kicks up, the insulated hood adds an extra layer of warmth. And, there are plenty of pockets throughout the jacket for snacks and daily necessities, there's even an internal goggle pocket to keep your goggles scratch-free.

  • Waterproof breathable DryVent™ 2-layer shell, seam sealed for ultimate weather protection
  • Lined with soft recycled polyester taffeta for easy layering
  • Heatseeker™ Eco recycled polyester insulation is lightweight and efficient
  • 200g insulation in body, 150g insulation in arms, 100g insulation in hood
  • Insulated 3-piece hood zips off
  • Dual zippered hand pockets keep small necessities close
  • Single zippered pocket on the left sleeve is a perfect home for a lift pass
  • Powder skirt helps seal out the white stuff when the fresh tracks run deep
  • Adjustable cuffs and wrist gaiters keep the warm in and the cold out
name: The North Face Freedom Extreme Insulated Jacket - Boys' - Children to Youths
